attributes.action: Iranians won’t vote anymore until uk government stands beside Iranian people
attributes.additional_details: We believe uk government respects human rights and its best time to take action to stop this mass killing in Iran.
attributes.background: We would like uk government to stop Iranian government and their relatives entering to United Kingdom and their  assets to be blocked .

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petitions open on this topic which you might like to sign:

Seek stronger international sanctions against Iran
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624662

Offer assistance, asylum and support to those fleeing Iran.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624837

Condemn Iran for human rights violations linked to the regime
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623749

Cut diplomatic ties with Iran in support of current nationwide uprisings
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623743

Maintain sanctions and introduce visa ban on people linked to Iranian regime
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623572
